title: Debug Create Game Button Issue
description: Investigate why the create game button is not working by examining both client and server code flows, identify the root cause, and implement a fix.

title: Implement User Search for Opponent Selection
description: Add a server endpoint to search users by email or username and implement client-side functionality to search for opponents when creating a new game.

title: Further Debug Create Game Button Issue
description: Continue investigating why the create game button is still not working after the initial fix. Check for additional issues in the client-server communication, API endpoints, and request/response handling.
